sqlMap.select:
SELECT FROM V2_BANK_BEHALF_TRANS_DETAIL WHERE 1=1 AND V2_BANK_BEHALF_TRANS_DETAIL.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(TRANS_DETAIL_ID) =#trans_detail_id#
(BANK_BEHALF_ID) Like '%'||(#bank_behalf_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(MER_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BUS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#bus_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT1_NO) Like '%'||(#account1_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2_NO) Like '%'||(#account2_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2_NAME) Like '%'||(#account2_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACC2_BANK_CODE) Like '%'||(#acc2_bank_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AMOUNT) Like '%'||(#amount:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FEE) Like '%'||(#fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_CODE) Like '%'||(#res_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACC1_BALANCE) Like '%'||(#acc1_balance:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_BALANCE) Like '%'||(#mer_balance:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_FEE_BAL) Like '%'||(#mer_fee_bal:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(POSTSCRIPT) Like '%'||(#postscript:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACC2_BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#acc2_bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PRE_DETAIL_ID) Like '%'||(#pre_detail_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BRANCHNO) Like '%'||(#branchno:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(INDEX1) Like '%'||(#index1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_DESC) Like '%'||(#res_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM V2_BANK_BEHALF_TRANS_DETAIL WHERE 1=1 AND V2_BANK_BEHALF_TRANS_DETAIL.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(TRANS_DETAIL_ID) =#trans_detail_id#
(BANK_BEHALF_ID) Like '%'||(#bank_behalf_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(MER_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'

(ACCOUNT1_NO) Like '%'||(#account1_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2_NO) Like '%'||(#account2_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2_NAME) Like '%'||(#account2_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACC2_BANK_CODE) Like '%'||(#acc2_bank_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AMOUNT) Like '%'||(#amount:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FEE) Like '%'||(#fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_CODE) Like '%'||(#res_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACC1_BALANCE) Like '%'||(#acc1_balance:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_BALANCE) Like '%'||(#mer_balance:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_FEE_BAL) Like '%'||(#mer_fee_bal:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(POSTSCRIPT) Like '%'||(#postscript:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACC2_BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#acc2_bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PRE_DETAIL_ID) Like '%'||(#pre_detail_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BRANCHNO) Like '%'||(#branchno:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(INDEX1) Like '%'||(#index1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RES_DESC) Like '%'||(#res_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
